long description: Unlimited Local On-Net Calls + 3000 Local National Mins -- 1 GB 3G/4G Data -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable. -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity

Additional data can be used on 4G handset only) -- Commercial Usage Policy applicable as per company policy. For any customer found violating any of these conditions,  tariff @ Rs 0.30/min -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity
